Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.apache.datasketches.theta.PairwiseSetOperations
    v2.0.0. This class has been deprecated as equivalent functionality has been added to the SetOperation classes: Union, Intersection and AnotB.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.apache.datasketches.kll.KllSketch.getCurrentCompactSerializedSizeBytes()
    version 4.0.0 use KllSketch.getSerializedSizeBytes().
    org.apache.datasketches.kll.KllSketch.getCurrentUpdatableSerializedSizeBytes()
    version 4.0.0 use KllSketch.getSerializedSizeBytes().
    org.apache.datasketches.theta.PairwiseSetOperations.aNotB​(Sketch, Sketch)
    v2.0.0. Use AnotB.aNotB(Sketch, Sketch) instead, which has more complete seed handling.
    org.apache.datasketches.theta.PairwiseSetOperations.intersect​(Sketch, Sketch)
    v2.0.0. Use Intersection.intersect(Sketch, Sketch) instead, which has more complete seed handling.
    org.apache.datasketches.theta.PairwiseSetOperations.union​(CompactSketch, CompactSketch)
    v2.0.0. Please use Union.union(Sketch, Sketch) instead, which has more complete seed handling.
    org.apache.datasketches.tuple.Sketches.heapifyUpdatableSketch​(Memory, SummaryDeserializer<S>, SummaryFactory<S>)
    As of 3.0.0, heapifying an UpdatableSketch is deprecated. This capability will be removed in a future release. Heapifying a CompactSketch is not deprecated.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.apache.datasketches.tuple.adouble.DoubleSketch​(Memory, DoubleSummary.Mode)
    As of 3.0.0, heapifying an UpdatableSketch is deprecated. This capability will be removed in a future release. Heapifying a CompactSketch is not deprecated.
    org.apache.datasketches.tuple.aninteger.IntegerSketch​(Memory, IntegerSummary.Mode)
    As of 3.0.0, heapifying an UpdatableSketch is deprecated. This capability will be removed in a future release. Heapifying a CompactSketch is not deprecated.
    org.apache.datasketches.tuple.strings.ArrayOfStringsSketch​(Memory)
    As of 3.0.0, heapifying an UpdatableSketch is deprecated. This capability will be removed in a future release. Heapifying a CompactSketch is not deprecated.
    org.apache.datasketches.tuple.UpdatableSketch​(Memory, SummaryDeserializer<S>, SummaryFactory<S>)
    As of 3.0.0, heapifying an UpdatableSketch is deprecated. This capability will be removed in a future release. Heapifying a CompactSketch is not deprecated.
